mapper.insert: insert into review(user_id, peer_id, project_no, comment1, comment2, score1, score2, score3, score4, score5, reg_date) values(#{user_id}, #{peer_id}, #{project_no}, #{comment1}, #{comment2}, #{score1}, #{score2}, #{score3}, #{score4}, #{score5}, now())
mapper.select: select round(avg(total)) as avg from (select * from review where peer_id = #{user_id} and project_no = #{no}) a group by project_no
